text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    EmCare.B14S2.DE41Mouth Sores or Mouth Ulcers - Deep and ExtensiveThe client has mouth sores or mouth ulcers that are deep and extensive
    EmCare.B14S2.DE42Mouth Sores or Mouth Ulcers - Not Deep and ExtensiveThe client has mouth sores or mouth ulcers that are not deep and extensive
    EmCare.B14S2.DE40Oral ThrushThe client has oral thrush
    EmCare.B14S2.DE39No Oral Sores or Mouth UlcersThe client is not reported to have oral sores or mouth ulcers

concept.display: Mouth Sores or Mouth Ulcers - Deep and Extensive

designation.value: The client has mouth sores or mouth ulcers that are deep and extensive

concept.display: Mouth Sores or Mouth Ulcers - Not Deep and Extensive

designation.value: The client has mouth sores or mouth ulcers that are not deep and extensive

concept.display: No Oral Sores or Mouth Ulcers

designation.value: The client is not reported to have oral sores or mouth ulcers
